Text: Confirmation Ticket purchaseDear Customer Thank you for purchasing your tickets through the Admission Network Web site This message confirms your purchase as follows Event FRI DRALION Venue CIRQUE DU SOLEIL HOUSTON Date January Time PM Number of tickets Starting at seat Level SECT Section Row B Seat Your Delivery Choice see note below Mail Confirmation number The amount of USD has already been charged to your Visa credit card The charge will appear as Admission Tickets on your monthly credit card statement Mail Delivery Please allow us at least a delay of two weeks However if you still have not received your tickets the day before the event please call and ask for a customer service supervisor
